Text: Aside from the time zone bug, I had a perfectly good working game until I installed this.....bummer.
Maybe my error, until I find out for certain, apologizes to the uploader
Yep, killed the single player exe, lost all my saves and settings. Back to square one.

It broke after I installed this. I uninstalled and used http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7851522/Call.of.Duty.Black.Ops.II.Update.1.and.2-SKIDROW then I left it alone. Works great so far. I'm only thru the 2nd mission though.
I install the game and run first time it's working perfect but 2 days later the game is not run fuck yaaaaaa

Gordo, the update you mentioned, worked for me too, or at least the game started. However, once I get to the level preceded by the movie of the little girl being yanked out of bed, I got a freeze.

That freeze was why I was back here for updates to begin with.

I'm not really complaining about folks trying to give us a fix but for now, we pay or we wait. :)
